casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

February 11, 2008

[Cite as 02/11/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-Ohio-497.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-0160. McAllister v. Smith.

Marion App. No. 9-07-45. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Marion County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for appointment of counsel,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
